title: Book Cover, "Written on the Body"
description: Front cover, thick pumpkin-colored band along upper edge with two lines of black text containing author's name. Below pumpkin-colored band, black and white photographic image of a woman's body in profile from chest to upper thigh. Figure is positioned diagonally from upper right to lower left corner of page. Title, superimposed on body in ascending pattern to follow the contours of the figure.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "Written on the Body".offset lithography. Gift of Steven Heller. 1996-74-244.
